contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Varsseveld |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Gelderland |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = [[Oude IJsselstreek]] |area_km2 = |population = 6000 |population_as_of = |density = |website = |image_shield = |latNS = N |longEW = E |latd = 51 |latm = 56 |lats = 36 |longd = 6 |longm = 27 |longs = 34 }} [[Image:gemeentehuis-varsseveld.jpg|thumb|right|(Former) town hall, Varsseveld]] '''Varsseveld''' is a town in the [[Netherlands]], located in the Dutch municipality of [[Oude IJsselstreek]]. It is the hometown of [[football (soccer)|football]] coach [[Guus Hiddink]], and of cyclist [[Robert Gesink]]. Varsseveld was a separate municipality between 1812 and 1818, when it was merged with [[Wisch (Gelderland)|Wisch]].<ref>{{Repertorium Nederlandse Gemeenten}}</ref> ==Sport== Varsseveld hosted the [[2009 Sidecarcross world championship|2009]] [[Sidecarcross world championship|Dutch Sidecarcross Grand Prix]], on 7 June. Varsseveld hosted a [[strongman (strength athlete)|Strongman]] contest, the [[Strongman Champions League]] Holland Grand Prix on June 1, 2008. The winner of the contest was [[Zydrunas Savickas]] from [[Lithuania]]. Footballcoach Guus Hiddink was born and grew up in Varsseveld. Cyclist Robert Gesink was born and grew up in Varsseveld. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Kuyper|Varsseveld|ge|wisch2}} Map of the former municipality, around 1868. {{Coord|51|57|N|6|28|E|region:NL_type:city|display=title}} ==Events== Annual events include: * Nationale motorcross (May) * Eeuwig Erbarmen Festival/â€™n drom (first Saturday in July) * men-wedstrijden (July) * Varssevelds Volksfeest, thist Volksfeest is for a lot of people the best party ever (third weekend in August) * Koetsentocht en Monicadag it's very nice to see(July) [[Category:Populated places in Gelderland]] [[Category:Former municipalities of Gelderland]] {{gelderland-geo-stub}}
